name: Harmony of the Spheres
description:
Make sure you read the controls in the main menu before you start so that you don't get lost!

If it ever gets stuck, just reload the page and everything should be saved.

Adventure through a strange world and defeat its inhabitants in battle to obtain their abilities. Buff your pet capybara with these abilities to destroy your animal opponents! Don't forget to capture them for later "studying". 

Assets:

 Coolvetica font courtesy of DaFont, Custom skyboxes courtesy of unity asset store

All other assets created by me.

I hope you enjoy playing my game, feel free to comment your thoughts!
